title: Manage Closed Captioning for Live Stream
description: An agent must ensure real-time closed captioning is working correctly for a live streamed press conference.

tasks.description: Connect the live audio feed to the automated real-time captioning service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets up the connection.

tasks.description: Monitor the live captions for accuracy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent watches the captions and makes minor corrections to names and technical terms in real time.

tasks.description: Ensure the captions are properly embedded in the final live stream.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the captions are appearing correctly for viewers.
